page.title: 17Cecilia's Day (aged 9)
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and have Weetabix, crackers and weak coffee for breakfast. I go to school at 8.50.The teacher blows the whistle at 9 and we get into line.We have lessons until 10.40 when it is playtime. There is a school shop in the hall. After play we get changed for PE where sometimes we play Kingball - a game where one person tries to hit another with the ball; if you are hit, then you are out. At noon I go home for my lunch school restarts at 1 when we have lessons until 2.15 when there is another break, school finishing at 3.30. Back at home I have a drink and a biscuit and watch television - programmes like Dramarama and Cornonation Street. I have supper at 9.30 before going to bed then my Mum puts my light out about 10.30 and gives me a kiss goodnight.
